## About Me

I'm a full time web developer that builds web and mobile applications at Valcom, Inc. Right now, I use React.js and Python, but I am also branching out and trying to learn Node.js and Django to further increase my skillset. After attending RenderATL, I also found Ionic interesting and I wish to play around with it as well! 

Other than working, I enjoy gaming, struggling to plan and finish the first draft of novels, and listening to various fiction on Audible.
